text: A pump is a machine which moves a liquid from one place to another, often upwards. Pumps need some kind of power, often kinetic energy, to make them work. Sometimes the power comes from a person. Sometimes the power comes from a motor. == Types of pumps == There are many different kinds of pumps. Some types of pumps are: * Air pump * Boiler feedwater pump * Fire pump * Heat pump == Related pages == * Gas compressor == Resources == * Pumps history - 2000 BC to Now Category:Engineering Category:Mechanics Category:Tools
title: Pump
